t = int(raw_input());
for i in range(t):
	n = int(raw_input());
	arr = map(int,raw_input().split());
	arr = sorted(arr);
	# print arr;
	first = 0;
	last = n-1;
	ans = []
	while first <= last :
		ans.append(str(arr[first]));		
		first+=1;
		if first <= last:
			ans.append(str(arr[last]));
		last-=1;
	s = ' '.join(ans);
	print s;
